data_embedding module¶

Embedding classical image into quantum circuit

data_embedding.embed_image(img: Array, wires: List[int]) → None[source]¶

Embed classical image into quantum circuit in reflection and rotation equivariant way with Coordinate-Aware Amplitude Embedding.

\[U(x)|0\ket = \sum_i=1^n x_{i,j} |i\ket |j\ket\]
Parameters:

  • img (jnp.ndarray) – Image to embed into quantum circuit

  • wires (List[int]) – Ordered list of quantum circuit wires to embed the image.
